traits.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
traits.desc: The githzerai's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components: * At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible) * 3/day each: feather fall, jump, see invisibility, shield

traits.name: Psychic Defense
traits.desc: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The githzerai makes two unarmed strikes.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon attack.
